Colombian President Praises DPRK's Policies
articles.content:
Colombian President Praises DPRK's Policies 
   Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Alvaro Uribe Velez, president of Colombia, highly praised the independent policies of the DPRK and hoped that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would develop in various fields including politics, economy and culture.
 When receiving credentials from Pak Hyok, DPRK ambassador to Colombia, on November 30, the president said:    
 We support the Korean people's struggle for reunifying the country by their nation itself and will closely cooperate with the DPRK in the international arena.

Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao Ambassador
   Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Chanpheng Sihaphom, Lao ambassador e.p. to the DPRK who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.
 Present there were Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned and Phonekham Inthaboualy, councilor of the Lao embassy here.
